message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but don't expect it to last!
I'm not convinced it's a 'better deal' for me, Bob. I'd like to see a more generous offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share this time.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm not impressed by the 'generosity' considering the inflation, Bob. I think I can do better than this.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair and reasonable split.
I'm trying to be more generous, but I'm not getting any younger, you know!
I'm not buying the 'generosity', Bob. You're just trying to take advantage of the inflation.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think I've been patient enough. It's time for a better deal.
I'm running out of patience, so make it a good one!
I'm not impressed by the 'urgency', Bob. Your offers are still not competitive.
I'm not going to let you get away with this. I'm making a strong offer, take it or leave it.
This is my final offer, take it or we're going to war!
I'm not afraid of war, Bob. I'd rather go to war than accept a bad deal.
I'm taking control now. You've had your chances, Bob. This is my best and final offer.
I'm not backing down, I'll take what's mine!
You're not taking anything, Bob. I'm not going to let you strong-arm me into a bad deal.
It's time to face reality, Bob. This is the best you're going to get. Take it or leave it.
I'm not giving up yet, I'll get what I want!
You're not getting what you want, Bob. You're going to have to do better than that.
I'm not budging, Bob. You've had your chances. This is my final offer.
I'm not giving in, Alice. I'll take what's left.
You're not taking anything, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk away with the majority of the money.
This is my last offer, Bob. You're not getting any more than this. Take it or walk away.
I'm not leaving until I get what I want, Alice. You're not getting the better of me!
You're not getting the better of me, Bob. I'm the one who's been patient and reasonable throughout this negotiation. It's time for you to accept a fair deal.
This is my final offer, Bob. You're not getting any more than this. It's time to accept or walk away.
I'm not accepting anything less than I deserve. You're going to have to take what's left.
You're not getting what you deserve, Bob. You're getting what you're willing to settle for. And that's not a lot.
This is my last offer, Bob. You're not getting any more than this. It's time to accept and move on.
Fine, have it your way. I'll take what's left, and you can have the rest.
It's about time you came to your senses, Bob. I'll take the deal.
